doc:
Ralph Bellamy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Bellamy 0 Ralph Rexford Bellamy (June 17, 1904 – November 29, 1991) was an American actor whose career spanned 62 years on stage, film, and television. During his career, he played leading roles as well as supporting roles, garnering acclaim and awards, including an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actor for The Awful Truth (1937). Ralph_Rexford_Bellamy ( June_17_,_1904 – November_29_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor whose_career spanned 62_years on stage , film , and television . During his_career , he played_leading roles as_well_as supporting roles , garnering acclaim_and_awards , including an_Academy_Award_nomination for Best_Supporting_Actor for The_Awful_Truth_(_1937_) .
